participant_1.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

participant_2.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: What do you do in your free time?
I love learning about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
That sounds really cool! I'm not much of a reader but I love to cook and watch food videos.
That's really cool! I love to cook too! I love watching the flavors come together and seeing how the food turns out.
Me too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes! I have a really great recipe for spaghetti and meatballs that I make all the time.
That sounds delicious! I love spaghetti and meatballs! I'm not a very good cook, but I love to eat.
Well, you're in luck! I'm a really good cook and I love to share my recipes.
That's so nice of you! I would love to learn how to make your spaghetti and meatballs recipe.
Sure thing! I'll send you the recipe later today.
Thanks! I can't wait to try it!
No problem! I hope you like it!
